Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_digital_master_volume

The function AIL_digital_master_volume returns the current digital master volume setting in use.

S32 AIL_digital_master_volume(
  HDIGDRIVER dig
);

In Parameters

dig
indicates the driver for which the master volume setting is to be determined.

Returns

The current digital master volume setting in standard MIDI units (0-127, with 0 corresponding to complete silence and 127 corresponding to zero attenuation).

Discussion

By default, the digital master volume value is initialized to 127 (no attenuation).


Group: 2D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_sample_volume, AIL_set_digital_master_volume, AIL_set_sample_volume
Related Basic Types: HDIGDRIVER, S32
